ygData.subject: roleplaying
ygData.msgSnippet: wow. *is in thorough awe* i feel like such a newbie. i gather that a lot of you have been playing for quite a while. i only started at new years. i guess
ygData.messageBody:
wow.
*is in thorough awe*
i feel like such a newbie.
i gather that a lot of you have been playing for quite a while. i only
started at new years.

i guess essentially, what you do is the same as what i do for ark - a young,
hottempered, compassionate half elf sorcerous that is too powerful for her
own good. i use her for multiple online role plays and i eventually made a
bio for her. i just find it harder to role play "standing up". as in - at
the moment, right there.

kudos to all, i must say. *smiles*

lynnara starspinner
bard of the 21st song
dominant lioness of lion's share
as well as advisor, record keeper, punching bag, sounding board, and
mother-figure
